item.title: Installing and Setting up MQTT
item.description: Installation sudo apt update sudo apt install -y mosquitto mosquitto-clients sudo snap install mqtt-explorer Example Setup sudo cp /usr/share/doc/mosquitto/examples/mosquitto.
